UNDER CONSTRUCTION: This page is a work-in-progress.
A liberty-preserving shield for America  5 universal goals, 18 evidence-backed policies, zero ideology.

**Protect. Fair Shot. One Rule. Real Results. Smart Freedom.**  
Your family is safe. Your kid has a real chance. Same rules for all. Policies that work. Freedom with brakes.

What if government wasn't about endless debates or tribal loyalties? What if it was just a smart, self-correcting shield that protects you, gives everyone a fair start, and gets out of your way?

That's the Guard Pact. It's not an ideology pushing beliefs on youit's a **governance filter**, a decision engine designed to help you decide what's best for our nation. It doesn't dictate *what you should want*. Instead, it gives you **how to decide**, using 5 measurable, self-evident goals that over 90% of Americanslike youalready agree on:

- **Protect your life & safety**
- **Give every kid a fair shot**
- **One rulebook for all of us**
- **Evidence over experts**
- **Maximum liberty with circuit-breakers**

Think of it like a firewall protecting your computernot a flag you wave. 

- An **ideology** might say: This is good because my group believes it.
- The **Guard Pact** asks: Does this pass all 5 filters? And if the data shows it failing, do we fix it or kill it right away?

It's anti-fragile pragmatism built for you: No sacred cows. No permanent power grabs. Just a shield for your safety, fairness for your family, and forward motion for our countryconstantly tested by real-world results.

In essence, it's like a bug bounty program for government. Spot a flaw in a policy? We fix or scrap itno emotions, no excuses. This keeps government efficient, supportive, and always moving you forward.

## The 5 Universal High-Level Goals (HLGs)
These resonate with over 90% of Americans just like youno ideology, just the protection, fairness, and progress you deserve.

| HLG | One-Liner | Core Principle |
|-----|-----------|----------------|
| **1. Protect Life & Safety** | Every citizen like you is secure  from crime, invasion, or collapse. | **Shield First** |
| **2. Fair Shot for Every Kid** | No childs future is decided by zip code, income, or identitygiving your kids the start they need. | **Opportunity Egalitarianism** |
| **3. One Rulebook for All** | Same laws, same consequences  no exceptions, no side doors for anyone. | **Impartial Rule of Law** |
| **4. Evidence Over Experts** | Policies live or die by real-world results that affect younot theories or lobbyists. | **Empirical Governance** |
| **5. Sustainable Liberty** | Maximum freedom for you  with automatic brakes when harm or waste is proven. | **Liberty with Circuit-Breakers** |

Every policy has to pass **ALL 5** to make the cutor it's out. This ensures everything works for you.

[Why these 5 goals?](/01-hlg)

## 19 Essential, Evidence-Backed Policies
We've got *practical* policies tailored to these goalsfrom universal school choice to help your kids thrive, to shall-issue carry for your protection, nuclear power with dividends back in your pocket, and more. All come with built-in sunsets and circuit-breakers to keep them accountable.

| # | Policy | Key Win for You |
|---|--------|---------|
| 1 | **Universal School Choice** | $15k per child, so you can pick any accredited school that fits your family. |
| 4 | **Shall-Issue Concealed Carry** | Self-defense as your civil right + $200 training credit to keep you safe. |
| 9 | **17% Flat Consumption Tax** | Tax what you spend, not what you earnwith a prebate for essentials to ease your burden. |
| 14 | **All-In Nuclear + Carbon Dividend** | 200 reactors by 2040; every carbon dollar returned directly to you. |
| 18 | **Prediction Markets + Citizen Juries** | Let data beat out dogma; 100 random citizens like you veto overreach. |

[Explore All 19 Policies](/02-essential-points)

## Why It Works for You
- **Self-Correcting**: Every rule includes a sunset, circuit-breaker, or opt-outso if it doesn't serve you, it's gone.
- **State Labs**: Hot-button issues (like abortion or marijuana) turn into real-world experiments where data decides what's best for communities like yours.
- **No Legacy Bloat**: Government's role? Shield you, unblock opportunities, and step asidefocusing on what matters to you.

### What about...
> - **Equity?** Only when **data proves it advances HLG #2** (e.g., progressive tax on scalable corporations funds HLG #2). **Never a goal.**  
> - **Assimilation?** A *natural outcome* of HLG #3  not a headline.  
> - **Protection?** HLG #1 is **explicit**  governments **first job**.

19 Points to push for the sake of liberty

### **1. Universal School Choice**

**Policy**: Every child receives $15,000/year (inflation-adjusted) to attend any accredited public, private, charter, or mentor-led program. Funds follow the child. No geographic monopoly.

|**HLG Alignment**|**Reasoning & Evidence**|**Circuit-Breaker**|
|---|---|---|
|**1. Protect**|Failing schools correlate with higher crime (Chicago: dropout  4x arrest risk).|Auto-expand if violent incidents in failing districts 10% in 2 years.|
|**2. Fair Shot**|Zip code currently predicts 70% of outcomes (Chetty). Vouchers equalize inputs.|Mandatory if test-score gap >15% between richest/poorest districts.|
|**3. One Rulebook**|Same $15k for every child  no income, race, or disability carve-outs.|N/A (universal).|
|**4. Evidence**|FL (20002025): +12% reading, +15% math; no cost increase (FL DOE).|Sunset if national average scores flatline 3 years.|
|**5. Liberty**|Parents opt out of failing systems.|Annual parent exit survey; <60% satisfaction  program audit.|

---

### **2. No Medical Transition for Minors**

**Policy**: Gender-affirming surgeries, hormones, or puberty blockers prohibited under 18. Therapy + parental consent required. Zero state funding at any age.

|**HLG Alignment**|**Reasoning & Evidence**|**Circuit-Breaker**|
|---|---|---|
|**1. Protect**|Brain plasticity ends ~25. Blockers  bone loss, infertility (Cass Review, 2024).|Re-evaluate if long-term studies (10+ yrs) show >90% positive outcomes.|
|**2. Fair Shot**|8090% of childhood dysphoria resolves naturally (DSM-5).|N/A (protects future autonomy).|
|**3. One Rulebook**|Applies to all minors  no exceptions for identity or wealth.|N/A.|
|**4. Evidence**|Sweden/Finland banned minors (20222024) after reviews showed weak evidence.|Mandatory review every 5 years with new longitudinal data.|
|**5. Liberty**|Adults (18+) retain full bodily autonomy.|Opt-in registry for 18+ with informed consent.|

---

### **3. 48-Hour Justice**

**Policy**: All minor crimes (theft, vandalism, simple assault)  trial within 48 hours of arrest. Restitution over incarceration. No plea-deal bloat.

|**HLG Alignment**|**Reasoning & Evidence**|**Circuit-Breaker**|
|---|---|---|
|**1. Protect**|NYC Broken Windows (1990s): misdemeanor enforcement  50% murder drop.|Auto-revert if violent crime 10% in pilot cities.|
|**2. Fair Shot**|Swift justice prevents cycle of despair in poor neighborhoods.|N/A.|
|**3. One Rulebook**|Same timeline for all  no bail loopholes for rich.|N/A.|
|**4. Evidence**|Houston CEASEFIRE: rapid intervention  30% recidivism drop.|Scale nationally if recidivism <15% in 3 years.|
|**5. Liberty**|Defendants out faster; victims compensated.|Opt-out for jury trial if requested within 24 hrs.|

---

### **4. Shall-Issue Concealed Carry**

**Policy**: Any law-abiding adult (21+) can carry concealed after background check + safety course. $200 federal tax credit for training/range time.

|**HLG Alignment**|**Reasoning & Evidence**|**Circuit-Breaker**|
|---|---|---|
|**1. Protect**|500k2.5M defensive gun uses/year (CDC/NRC).|Re-evaluate if mass shootings 20% in shall-issue states.|
|**2. Fair Shot**|Poor/minorities most victimized; credit offsets cost barrier.|N/A.|
|**3. One Rulebook**|Same standard nationwide  no state bans.|N/A.|
|**4. Evidence**|30+ studies: no crime spike post-shall-issue (Lott, NRC).|Mandatory DOJ review every 5 years.|
|**5. Liberty**|Self-defense = civil right.|Revocation only via due process (felony, red-flag with hearing).|

**Policy**: Ban all non-state courts with civil or criminal jurisdiction (religious, tribal, corporate). Mediation allowed for contracts only.

|**HLG Alignment**|**Reasoning & Evidence**|**Circuit-Breaker**|
|---|---|---|
|**1. Protect**|Parallel systems  unequal outcomes (UK Sharia councils: women lose custody).|N/A.|
|**2. Fair Shot**|No child subject to inherited legal disadvantage.|N/A.|
|**3. One Rulebook**|**Core**: Monopoly on justice = non-negotiable.|N/A.|
|**4. Evidence**|U.S. precedent: state courts override all others (Article VI).|Annual audit of mediation compliance.|
|**5. Liberty**|Individuals free from coerced group law.|Opt-in arbitration for contracts only.|

## **19. State Lab Doctrine**

_Federal silence. State experiments. Data wins._

**Policy**: Any issue scoring **0/5 HLGs** at federal level is **banned from national policy**. States become live labs using **Charter Cities (#17)**, **Prediction Markets + Citizen Juries (#18)**, and **hard circuit-breakers**. Zero federal funding or mandates.

|**HLG Alignment**|**Reasoning & Evidence**|**Circuit-Breaker**|
|---|---|---|
|**1. Protect**|Prevents untested federal overreach.|N/A|
|**2. Fair Shot**|Local solutions fit local kids.|N/A|
|**3. One Rulebook**|50 labs  one rulebook (by design).|N/A|
|**4. Evidence**|5-yr max for state pilots to show results.|Auto-revert any state law if metric fails.|
|**5. Liberty**|Opt-in zones, exit anytime.|Federal preemption if state blocks exit.|

State Lab Doctrine: Federal Silence, State Experiments
How the Guard Pact uses states as laboratories of democracy to solve the most divisive issues.

The State Lab Doctrine is the Guard Pact's elegant solution for contentious issues that paralyze the nation. Instead of imposing one-size-fits-all federal mandates, it leverages the 50 states as "laboratories of democracy."

**The core principle is simple: Federal silence. State experiments. Data wins.**

Any issue that fails to align with the [5 High-Level Goals](/explanation/five-high-level-goals/) at a national level is removed from federal jurisdiction. This prevents untested, top-down policies and allows local communities to innovate.

States are empowered to run live A/B tests on policies using the Guard Pact's toolkit:
- **[Charter Cities](/essential-points/#17-charter-cities-act):** Opt-in zones for radical experimentation.
- **[Prediction Markets + Citizen Juries](/essential-points/#18-prediction-markets-citizen-juries):** Data-driven evaluation and citizen oversight.
- **Hard Circuit-Breakers:** Automatic sunset clauses if a policy fails to meet its stated goals.

This framework transforms intractable moral debates into empirical questions. It allows us to discover what *works* by observing real-world outcomes, rather than arguing about what *should* work.

### State Lab Issues (13 Topics)

Here are the initial 13 issues designated for the State Lab Doctrine. Each one is removed from federal control and handed to states, with a clear mandate to experiment and measure.

| # | Topic | State Rule | Circuit-Breaker |
|---|---|---|---|
| **19.1** | **Abortion** | Charter City A/B (e.g., 12-week vs birth). Prediction market on maternal mortality. | **5% maternal deaths** or **10% teen fertility**  auto-sunset. |
| **19.2** | **Marriage Age/Definition** | Cities test 16/18/21. Jury re-approves every 3 yrs. | **15% teen pregnancy**  revert. |
| **19.3** | **Recreational Marijuana** | Prediction market on DUI + overdose deaths. | **10% combined** in 2 yrs  ban. |
| **19.4** | **Physician-Assisted Suicide** | 100-citizen jury approval every 3 yrs. | **5% total suicide rate**  moratorium. |
| **19.5** | **Gambling** | Charter zone vs no-bet county. | **20% bankruptcy rate**  revert. |
| **19.6** | **Prostitution** | Legal brothel pilot. Market on trafficking arrests. | **15% trafficking**  ban. |
| **19.7** | **Death Penalty** | Jury re-approves per crime every 5 yrs. | **>1% wrongful convictions**  moratorium. |
| **19.8** | **Animal Ag Rules** | Vegan zone vs CAFO zone. | **20% food prices**  revert. |
| **19.9** | **Vaccine Mandates (Non-Pandemic)** | Jury approval only if outbreak >1% mortality. | Auto-sunset post-crisis. |
| **19.10** | **Zoning/Density** | YIMBY vs NIMBY cities. | **15% housing cost**  scale winner. |
| **19.11** | **Electoral Systems** | RCV vs jungle primary pilots. | **10% turnout +  incumbent lock**  adopt top 2. |
| **19.12** | **Trans Sports (K-12/College)** | Open vs bio-sex leagues in charter schools. | **<10% participation gap**  scale. |
| **19.13** | **Reparations** | Local cash pilot. Market on homeownership gap. | **<5% gap closure in 5 yrs**  sunset. |

This is not about avoiding hard conversations. It's about having *better* onesgrounded in evidence, accountable to citizens, and designed for discovery.

# How the Guard Pact Upgrades U.S. Law  
*Explanation: Why It Works, How It Fits, and What It Replaces*

The **Guard Pact** is not a new government.  
Its a **policy operating system**  a **filter layer** that sits on top of the U.S. Constitution and forces every law to pass **5 universal, measurable, non-partisan tests**.

This article explains **how it legally integrates**  and **why its bulletproof**.

---

## 1. Its a **Constitutional Overlay**, Not a Rewrite

| Feature | Guard Pact | U.S. Constitution |
|-------|------------|-------------------|
| **Authority** | Article XXVIII (proposed) | Articles IVII |
| **Scope** | Policy filter | Structure + rights |
| **Change needed** | One new article | Full rewrite (impossible) |

> **Result**: The Constitution stays intact. The Guard Pact just adds a **"software patch"**.

---

## 2. It Uses **Existing Legal Mechanisms**

| Mechanism | Guard Pact Use | Precedent |
|---------|----------------|---------|
| **Supremacy Clause** | HLG failure = law void | *Marbury v. Madison* |
| **10th Amendment** | State Labs (#19) | *Printz v. U.S.* |
| **Commerce Clause** | Limited to HLG-passed policies | *Wickard* (reversed in practice) |
| **Executive Orders** | Day 1 enforcement | Reagan, Trump EOs |

---

## 3. It **Self-Corrects** with Circuit-Breakers

Every policy includes **automatic off-switches**:

```plaintext
IF metric fails  POLICY DIES
IF metric succeeds  POLICY SCALES
```

### Examples

|Policy|Circuit-Breaker|
|---|---|
|School Choice|Test scores flat 3 yrs  audit|
|Nuclear Build|Emissions <1990  end carbon tax|
|Flat Tax|Revenue <95%  revert|

> **No more zombie laws.** Government becomes **antifragile**.

---

## 4. It **Respects Federalism** via State Labs

13 controversial issues (abortion, marijuana, zoning, etc.) are **banned from federal policy** and devolved to **Charter Cities** with:

- Prediction markets
- 100-citizen juries
- Hard sunset triggers

|Topic|Federal Role|State Role|
|---|---|---|
|Abortion|None|Charter City A/B test|
|Marijuana|None|Market on DUI/deaths|
|Zoning|None|YIMBY vs NIMBY zones|

> **Evidence wins. Politics loses.**

---

## 5. It **Ends Legal Fragmentation**

**Point #5**: One Law. No Parallel Courts.  Bans Sharia councils, tribal courts with criminal jurisdiction, corporate arbitration for public law.

|System|Status Under Pact|
|---|---|
|State courts|Monopoly on justice|
|Mediation|Allowed (contracts only)|
|Religious law|Banned if coercive|

> **One Rulebook = Blind Justice.**

---

## 6. Its **Politically Viable**

|HLG|Left Appeal|Right Appeal|Center Appeal|
|---|---|---|---|
|1. Protect|Anti-violence|Law & order|Basic duty|
|2. Fair Shot|Anti-poverty|Merit|Common sense|
|3. One Rulebook|Anti-cronyism|Anti-special treatment|Fairness|
|4. Evidence|Anti-corporate capture|Anti-bureaucracy|Data > dogma|
|5. Liberty|Guardrails|Sunset clauses|Freedom + feedback|

> **Polls at 90%+ approval** when framed this way.

---

## 7. It **Scales What Works**

| Tool                   | Function           | Evidence                    |
| ---------------------- | ------------------ | --------------------------- |
| **Charter Cities**     | Policy A/B testing | Shenzhen: $200M  $400B GDP |
| **Prediction Markets** | Truth > experts    | Tetlock: +30% accuracy      |
| **Citizen Juries**     | Veto overreach     | Swiss referenda model       |

```mermaid
graph TD
    A[U.S. Constitution] --> B[Article XXVIII: Guard Pact]
    B --> C[All Laws Must Pass 5 HLGs]
    C --> D[Fail Any = Void]
    C --> E[Pass All = Enforced]
    E --> F[Sunset + Circuit-Breakers]
    E --> G[State Labs for 13 Issues]
    F --> H[Auto-Correction]
    G --> I[Data Wins]    
```

**The Guard Pact doesnt replace America. It *upgrades* it.**

> **Keep the flag. Keep the freedoms. Add the filter.**

How to Integrate the Guard Pact into U.S. Law
A practical, step-by-step guide to enact the Guard Pact at federal, state, and local levels.

This guide walks you through **exactly what to do** to make the **Guard Pact** the operating system of American governance  **without rewriting the Constitution from scratch**.

---

## Step 1: Pass the **Guard Pact Act** (Federal Statute)

**Goal**: Require every federal bill and regulation to pass the **5 HLG Scorecard**.

### Actions
1. **Draft the bill** (use template below).
2. **Find 5 bipartisan sponsors** (2R, 2D, 1I) in House + Senate.
3. **Add to committee markup** via Rules Committee (House) or unanimous consent (Senate).
4. **Pass via reconciliation** (budget-related: tax, healthcare, energy policies).

```markdown
### Sample Bill Text (Guard Pact Act)
> **Section 1**: All proposed federal legislation, regulations, and executive actions must include a **5 HLG Scorecard** certifying passage of all five High-Level Goals.  
> **Section 2**: The Office of Empirical Governance (OEG) is established to score and publish results.  
> **Section 3**: Any policy failing any HLG is null and void upon judicial review.  
> **Section 4**: Sunset clauses mandatory unless reauthorized with evidence.
```

**Timeline**: Introduce in **January 2026**  Pass by **July 2026**.

---

## Step 2: Issue **Day 1 Executive Order**

**Goal**: Enforce HLG review on all new federal regulations.

### Actions

1. **President signs EO** on Inauguration Day (Jan 20, 2026 or 2029).
2. **Mandate OEG review** for every rule in Federal Register.
3. **Pause all non-HLG-compliant regs** within 90 days.


```markdown
### Sample EO Language
> All agencies shall submit a 5 HLG justification for any proposed rule. Rules failing any HLG are withdrawn.
```

---

## Step 3: Launch **Charter Cities** in 10 States

**Goal**: Create real-world policy labs using **Point #17**.

### Actions

|State|Action|Lead|
|---|---|---|
|TX, FL, AZ, NV, TN|Pass **State Charter Cities Act**|State Reps + YIMBY groups|
|CA, CO, UT, NC, OH|Voter initiative (ballot measure)|Citizen coalitions|

**Template law**: 5 cities, 50k+ pop, opt-in tax/zoning/school rules. Federal matching funds if HLG metrics improve.

---

## Step 4: Push **Constitutional Amendment** (Article XXVIII)

**Goal**: Make Guard Pact **permanent and supreme**.

### Actions

1. **34 states call** for Article V convention (focus: Guard Pact Amendment).
2. **Draft single article** (see below).
3. **Ratify in 38 states** within 7 years.



```markdown
### Article XXVIII  The Guard Pact
> All laws must advance **all five High-Level Goals (HLGs)**:  
> 1. Protect Life & Safety  
> 2. Fair Shot for Every Kid  
> 3. One Rulebook for All  
> 4. Evidence Over Experts  
> 5. Sustainable Liberty  
>  
> Congress shall define metrics. Sunset clauses and state labs are mandatory.
```

---

## Step 5: Enforce via **Courts + Citizen Juries**

### Actions

- **SCOTUS precedent**: Cite Article XXVIII to strike legacy laws.
- **Citizen lawsuits**: Use HLG failure as **standing**.
- **Point #18**: Fund CFTC-regulated prediction markets + 100-citizen juries to veto new bans.

---

## Step 6: Sunset 90% of Federal Code

**Goal**: Force reauthorization under HLGs.

### Actions

1. **Pass Sunset Omnibus Act** (2027).
2. **All non-HLG laws expire** in 5 years unless re-passed.
3. **OEG publishes Dead Law Report** annually.

### **1. Universal School Choice**

**Policy**: Every child receives $15,000/year (inflation-adjusted) to attend any accredited public, private, charter, or mentor-led program. Funds follow the child. No geographic monopoly.

|**HLG Alignment**|**Reasoning & Evidence**|**Circuit-Breaker**|
|---|---|---|
|**1. Protect**|Failing schools correlate with higher crime (Chicago: dropout  4x arrest risk).|Auto-expand if violent incidents in failing districts 10% in 2 years.|
|**2. Fair Shot**|Zip code currently predicts 70% of outcomes (Chetty). Vouchers equalize inputs.|Mandatory if test-score gap >15% between richest/poorest districts.|
|**3. One Rulebook**|Same $15k for every child  no income, race, or disability carve-outs.|N/A (universal).|
|**4. Evidence**|FL (20002025): +12% reading, +15% math; no cost increase (FL DOE).|Sunset if national average scores flatline 3 years.|
|**5. Liberty**|Parents opt out of failing systems.|Annual parent exit survey; <60% satisfaction  program audit.|

---

### **2. No Medical Transition for Minors**

**Policy**: Gender-affirming surgeries, hormones, or puberty blockers prohibited under 18. Therapy + parental consent required. Zero state funding at any age.

|**HLG Alignment**|**Reasoning & Evidence**|**Circuit-Breaker**|
|---|---|---|
|**1. Protect**|Brain plasticity ends ~25. Blockers  bone loss, infertility (Cass Review, 2024).|Re-evaluate if long-term studies (10+ yrs) show >90% positive outcomes.|
|**2. Fair Shot**|8090% of childhood dysphoria resolves naturally (DSM-5).|N/A (protects future autonomy).|
|**3. One Rulebook**|Applies to all minors  no exceptions for identity or wealth.|N/A.|
|**4. Evidence**|Sweden/Finland banned minors (20222024) after reviews showed weak evidence.|Mandatory review every 5 years with new longitudinal data.|
|**5. Liberty**|Adults (18+) retain full bodily autonomy.|Opt-in registry for 18+ with informed consent.|

### **3. 48-Hour Justice**

**Policy**: All minor crimes (theft, vandalism, simple assault)  trial within 48 hours of arrest. Restitution over incarceration. No plea-deal bloat.

|**HLG Alignment**|**Reasoning & Evidence**|**Circuit-Breaker**|
|---|---|---|
|**1. Protect**|NYC Broken Windows (1990s): misdemeanor enforcement  50% murder drop.|Auto-revert if violent crime 10% in pilot cities.|
|**2. Fair Shot**|Swift justice prevents cycle of despair in poor neighborhoods.|N/A.|
|**3. One Rulebook**|Same timeline for all  no bail loopholes for rich.|N/A.|
|**4. Evidence**|Houston CEASEFIRE: rapid intervention  30% recidivism drop.|Scale nationally if recidivism <15% in 3 years.|
|**5. Liberty**|Defendants out faster; victims compensated.|Opt-out for jury trial if requested within 24 hrs.|

|**1. Protect**|500k2.5M defensive gun uses/year (CDC/NRC).|Re-evaluate if mass shootings 20% in shall-issue states.|

|**5. Liberty**|Individuals free from coerced group law.|Opt-in arbitration for contracts only.|

## **19. State Lab Doctrine**

_Federal silence. State experiments. Data wins._

**Policy**: Any issue scoring **0/5 HLGs** at federal level is **banned from national policy**. States become live labs using **Charter Cities (#17)**, **Prediction Markets + Citizen Juries (#18)**, and **hard circuit-breakers**. Zero federal funding or mandates.

|**HLG Alignment**|**Reasoning & Evidence**|**Circuit-Breaker**|
|---|---|---|
|**1. Protect**|Prevents untested federal overreach.|N/A|
|**2. Fair Shot**|Local solutions fit local kids.|N/A|
|**3. One Rulebook**|50 labs  one rulebook (by design).|N/A|
|**4. Evidence**|5-yr max for state pilots to show results.|Auto-revert any state law if metric fails.|
|**5. Liberty**|Opt-in zones, exit anytime.|Federal preemption if state blocks exit.|
